notes.text:
This update for ganglia-web fixes the following issues:

- updated to 3.7.5 which fixes (bsc#1179835)
- CVE-2019-20378: Fixed a possible XSS via ce and cs parameters in header.php (bsc#1160761).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: ganglia-web (aka Ganglia Web Frontend) through 3.7.5 allows XSS via the header.php ce parameter.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
